## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                      | Type     | Default       |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | -------- | ------------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color of the icon                | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Icon from Phosphor Icons library | `string` | `"ph-smiley"` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the icon                 | `string` | `"16px"`      |
